title: Cooperation through Communication in a Distributed Problem-Solving Network
abstract: Distributed artificial intelligence is also known as decentralized artificial intelligence and it is a branch of artificial intelligence which tackles proceedings of intelligent agents. Scientific classification of DAI is introduced in light of the social capacities of a single agent, the association of agents, and the elements of this association by the time. Social capacities are portrayed by the thinking about different agents and the appraisal of a disseminated circumstance. Association relies upon the level of participation and on the model of communication. The elements of association are portrayed by the worldwide soundness of the gathering and the collaboration between agents. This chapter closes with significant issues that require further research in DAI.
